Rulings.Edison: ● This card's name is pronounced "Egg-Zay". Is it NOT ".exe", "ecks-y", or any alternative.
Rulings.Tengu: ● This card's name is pronounced "Egg-Zay". Is it NOT ".exe", "ecks-y", or any alternative.
Rulings.Goat:
(Pronounced egg-zay.)
●If you Summon Armor Exe, flip it face-down with Book of Moon, and flip it face-up with Book of Taiyou, it CAN attack because its non-attack effect was reset and because flipping it face-up with Book of Taiyou was NOT a Flip Summon.
●If Skill Drain is applying and Armor Exe is Summoned, or if Skill Drain is activated after Armor Exe is Summoned, in both cases Armor Exe CAN attack the same turn it was Summoned.
●Removing a Spell Counter from Armor Exe is a cost.

Rulings.Base:
1. (Pronounced 'egg-zay'.)
2. If you Summon "Armor Exe", flip it face-down with "Book of Moon", and flip it face-up with "Book of Taiyou", it CAN attack because its non-attack effect was reset and because flipping it face-up with "Book of Taiyou" was NOT a Flip Summon.
3. If "Skill Drain" is active and "Armor Exe" is Summoned, or if "Skill Drain" is activated after "Armor Exe" is Summoned, in both cases "Armor Exe" CAN attack the same turn it was Summoned.
4. Removing a Spell Counter from "Armor Exe" is a cost.

PSCT.Edison:
① can't attack the turn it is Normal, Flip, Special, or Egg summoned.
Ⓜ During each Standby Phase, remove 1 Spell Counter from your field or destroy this card.

① Cannot attack the turn it is Normal, Flip, Special, or Egg summoned.
